content.question: The function <math alttext="L"><mi>L</mi></math> is a linear transformation of vectors given by <math alttext="L open parentheses vector v close parentheses equals A vector v"><mi>L</mi><mfenced><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>A</mi><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math>, where <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> is a transformation matrix. If matrix <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> is defined as <math alttext="A 2 by 2 matrix. Row 1 column 1 is 0. Row 1 column 2 is 1. Row 2 column 1 is 2. Row 2 column 2 is 1."><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>, and the matrix <math alttext="A 2 by 3 vector matrix. Row 1 column 1 is 1. Row 1 column 2 is 2. Row 1 column 3 is 3. Row 2 column 1 is 4. Row 2 column 2 is 5. Row 2 column 3 is 6."><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>5</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>6</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math> is a matrix of input vectors, which of the following is the matrix of output vectors?

choices.label: <math alttext="A 2 by 3 vector matrix. Row 1 column 1 is 1. Row 1 column 2 is 2. Row 1 column 3 is 3. Row 2 column 1 is 12. Row 2 column 2 is 15. Row 2 column 3 is 18."><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>12</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>15</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>18</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="A 2 by 3 vector matrix. Row 1 column 1 is 4. Row 1 column 2 is 5. Row 1 column 3 is 6. Row 2 column 1 is 6. Row 2 column 2 is 9. Row 2 column 3 is 12."><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>5</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>6</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>6</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>9</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>12</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="A 2 by 3 vector matrix. Row 1 column 1 is 4. Row 1 column 2 is 5. Row 1 column 3 is 6. Row 2 column 1 is 8. Row 2 column 2 is 10. Row 2 column 3 is 12."><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>5</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>6</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>8</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>10</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>12</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="A 2 by 3 vector matrix. Row 1 column 1 is 8. Row 1 column 2 is 10. Row 1 column 3 is 12. Row 2 column 1 is 5. Row 2 column 2 is 7. Row 2 column 3 is 9."><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>8</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>10</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>12</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>5</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>7</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>9</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="A 2 by 3 vector matrix. Row 1 column 1 is 4. Row 1 column 2 is 5. Row 1 column 3 is 6. Row 2 column 1 is 6. Row 2 column 2 is 9. Row 2 column 3 is 12."><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>5</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>6</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>6</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>9</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>12</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
